sentences.en: He was convicted of illegally using a handgun.
According to the statement you made, you had never seen the handgun before it was found in your bag.
sentences.cn: 根据你所作出的陈述，在你的包里发现这把手枪之前，你从来没有见过它。

sentences.en: Now it seems that a handgun was found in your luggage.
sentences.cn: 现在看来他们在你的行李里发现了一把手枪。
